meanings.definition: A person who forms an opinion or makes a decision based on evidence or reasoning.
meanings.sent1: The judger carefully considered all the facts before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a fair judger in our community.
meanings.sent3: The judger couldn't resist solving the mystery of the missing cookies.
meanings.sent4: His pet cat became the judger of which toy was the best.
meanings.sent5: The judger's sharp eyes missed nothing during the investigation.

meanings.definition: To form an opinion or make a decision about someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I will judger the best route to take before we start our journey.
meanings.sent2: Please don't judger him too quickly; he may surprise you.
meanings.sent3: She tends to judger the weather by looking at the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The chef will judger the taste of the soup before adding more salt.
meanings.sent5: Before you judger, try to understand the situation from their perspective.
